channel.description: Week 8 Announcements This Week Discussion 2 Lab 4 Quizzes Next Week: Lab 4 Success Read Carefully See Posted Hints Use Resources Ask Questions Don't "Spin Your Wheels" Lab 4 Windows Server VM Active Directory OpenLDAP Configure Clients Configure Interop MAKE SNAPSHOTS Lab 5 Create Cloud Resources SSH Config & Firewall Apache Virtual Hosts Docker Setup Reverse Proxy Upcoming Travel Oct 12-15 Oct 19-22 Responses & grading may be delayed Keep in Touch!
